how_it_works_desc: To trade, you'll need to fund your account. If you already own crypto, you can deposit funds directly from a wallet or exchange.
portfolio_table_title_msg: Once your order is created, it will appear after a 30-60 second delay.
send_usdt_ethereum_msg: Send USDT (on Ethereum) and receive the equivalent value in your wallet in <1 minute.
send_usdt_arbitrum_msg: Send USDT (on Arbitrum) and receive the equivalent value in your wallet in <1 minute.
insufficient_funds_msg: Insufficient funds. You cannot deposit more than your available balance.
only_send_to_a_usdt_address: Only send to a USDT address on the Mainnet of Arbitrum network.
please_enter_a_valid_address: Please enter a valid address that starts with '0x'.
the_withdrawal_is_currently_under_review: The withdrawal is currently under review. We will credit the amount to your account within 24 hours.
the_username_can_only_include: The username can only include lowercase English letters and numbers.
i_agree_the_terms: I agree the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
at_least_six_characters_and_numbers: At least 6 characters, including lowercase letters and numbers.
must_be_in_english_plus_numbers: Must be in English plus numbers
please_sign_the_message: Please sign the message in your compatible wallet to connect to market.
please_enter_a_avlid_address: Please enter a valid address that starts with '0x'
there_was_an_error_with_your_amount: There was an error with your amount. Please try again.
if_you_are_a_gmail_connected_user: If you are a Gmail-Connected user, please click the 'Send from exchange instead' below to proceed with your deposit.
usdt_to_the_address_below: USDT to the address below and select Ethereum or Artbitrum as the network. Only integers can be withdrawn.
no_relevant_topic: Markets is currently no relevant topic information
choose_a_market_desc: Bet on current events, politics, sports, and much more as the action unfolds. Market prices reflect the live odds of an event taking place.
place_a_bet_desc: When you're ready to trade, simply choose an outcome and specify the amount you want to bet. Market orders execute instantly at the current odds, while limit orders let you set your desired odds for others to trade with.
earn_if_you_are_right_desc: When the market ends, each share will either be worth $1 if you were right, or $0 if you were wrong. If you don't want to wait until the end, you can sell your shares at any time at the current odds.
insufficient_withdraw_funds_msg: Insufficient funds. You cannot withdraw more than your available balance.
something_went_wrong_please_try_again_la: Oops... Something went wrong. Please try again later.
promotion_is_not_found_or_expired: Promotion is not found or expired
earn_oX_points_for_each_friend_you_refer: Earn OX Points for each friend you refer
share_your_referral_link_with_friends_to: Share your referral link with friends to earn
the_referral_program_will_launch_in_nove: The referral program will launch in November 2024.
share_your_referral_link_with_friends: Share your referral link with friends
your_friends_need_to_sign_up_and_make_a_: Your friends need to sign up and make a 1 USDT transaction.
the_inviterreceives_ox_points: The inviter receives 5,000 OX Points, and their friends gets 2,500 OX Points.
